thread.title: CP rail conductors and locomotive engineers authorize strike: union

title: CP rail conductors and locomotive engineers authorize strike: union
text:
April 6, 2018 / 4:40 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago CP rail conductors and locomotive engineers authorize strike: union Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
MONTREAL, April 6 (Reuters) - Canadian Pacific Railway conductors and locomotive engineers on Friday voted to authorize a strike action that could have the 3,000 workers walk off the job as early as April 21, Teamsters Canada said in a statement. 
The workers, whose collective agreement expired late last year, are asking for more predictable schedules to combat crew fatigue, among other demands, a Teamsters spokesman said by phone. Reporting By Allison Lampert Editing by Chizu Nomiyama
